details.PropertyDetail: 3000 sq-ft, 3 Bedroom, Semi-furnished, Luxurious, South facing apartment for rent in Washington, USA
details.MoreInfo: Family rooms are the largest rooms in our hotel and can accommodate up to 5 guests. Split into two sections, you'll find a queen bed in one and either a single bed or two twin beds in the other. Depending on the configuration, these rooms are either 35 or 40 sq m. Amenities include: Shower Telephone Safe Mini-fridge Satellite LCD TVs (one in each section) Seating unit Hair dryer Free WiFi
